nodes.text: The Kimble Award was one of the most famous Republic Seal of Service awards given by the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. Kimble Awards were bestowed upon the Republic's lifesaving physicians, and as a Seal of Service award were fitted with a specialized transponder that identified the recipient and their accomplishments.
The Kimble Award was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
